abstract.p: Correction: 'Most Wanted' chart in special Outlook issue of Business Day carried incorrect ranking, based on advertising pages, for top nationally circulated magazines in shelter category

block.p: The ''Most Wanted'' chart in the special Outlook issue of Business Day on Monday carried incorrect rankings, based on advertising pages, for the top nationally circulated magazines in the shelter category. A corrected list appears today, on Page C7.

In addition, the list of top-ranked broadcast television series misstated the title of the No. 1 program. It is N.F.L. Post Gun, not N.F.L. (Sunday). And the list of rankings for television specials misstated the rating for the Super Bowl. It was 40.4, not 35.2.

The ''Most Wanted'' chart in the special Outlook issue of Business Day on Monday carried incorrect rankings, based on advertising pages, for the top nationally circulated magazines in the shelter category. A corrected list appears today, on Page C7.

In addition, the list of top-ranked broadcast television series misstated the title of the No. 1 program. It is N.F.L. Post Gun, not N.F.L. (Sunday). And the list of rankings for television specials misstated the rating for the Super Bowl. It was 40.4, not 35.2.
